show_name: Doraemon the Movie: "Kachi-Kochi" Nobita's Great Adventure in the Antarctic
other_title: Doraemon - Il film: Nobita e la grande avventura in Antartide "Kachi Kochi" (Italian)
Eiga Doraemon: Nobita no Nankyoku Kachi Kochi Daibōken (Japanese)
映画ドラえもん のび太の南極カチコチ大冒険 (Japanese)
电影哆啦A梦：大雄的南极冰冰凉大冒险 (Chinese (PRC))
電影哆啦A夢：大雄的南極冰天雪地大冒險 (Chinese (Taiwan))
電影多啦A夢：大雄之南極凍冰冰大冒險 (Chinese (Hong Kong))
plot: Nobita and his friends find a strange frozen ring, which guides them to Antarctica in search of its owner. There, they stumble upon some ancient ruins and begin an adventure, facing the danger that the Earth may become frozen.
opening_theme: "Yume wo Kanaete Doraemon" (夢をかなえてドラえもん) by mao
ending_theme: "Boku no Kokoro wo Tsukutteyo" (Make My Heart) by Ken Hirai
